name: Parashqevi Simaku
description: '''Parashqevi Simaku''' (born 1 September 1966) is an Albanian singer who rose to prominence in the 1980s and became one of the most recognizable voices in Albanian popular music during the late [[Fall of communism in Albania|communist period]]. She is best known for her performances at [[Festivali i Këngës]], winning first prize in 1985 and 1988.
